OrgName: Starwave Corporation dba Disney Connected and Advanced Technologies (DCAT)
activities:
DCAT processes or will process personal data on its servers in the US in relation to:  

(1) Registration database and related Internet data sources, including personal information directly supplied by visitors to various Disney or third party websites via online or mobile devices, or supplied offline and manually entered by system administrators, for a number of purposes including sweepstakes entries, opt in for promotional information, or for access to restricted access information on websites.  This database will include personally identifiable data including name, mailing address, email address and telephone numbers of individuals.  
(2) The Disney Store Online System (“TDSOS”) will store transactional data for online purchases including customer contact information including name, shipping address and telephone numbers of individuals.
(3) Remus is an internally developed site that will allow microsites to manage/upload User Generated Content. The site will include personally identifiable data including customer name, email address, date of birth and other optional contact information.
(4) Staro is a user interface processing personally identifiable information, including customer name, email address, and other optional contact information.
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel, Chief Trust Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
